title: Qureshi condoles death of Ataul Mahaiman Bukhari
content:
MULTAN, Feb 06 (APP): Foreign Minister Shah Mahmood Qureshi expressed
condolence over demise Ameer Majlis Ahrar-e-Islam (Pakistan) Syed Ataul Mahaiman Shah
Bukhari, son of religious scholar Syed Ata Ullah Shah Bukhari.
The minister, in his condolence message, said late Syed Ataul Mahaiman Shah Bukhari was
a great Islamic figure. He prayed the Almighty to rest the departed soul in eternal peace
and grant courage to his family to bear the loss with fortitude.
